name: OcuMOL Leap
tagline: Incorporating the Oculus Rift and Leap Motion into PyMOL.
body:
### 3-D Visualization and Manipulation of Molecules with PyMOL, Leap Motion, and Oculus Rift

This is an **alpha** release of Python software for PyMOL which can be used to visualize (Oculus Rift) and manipulate (Leap Motion) molecules in 3-D. This software has lots of dependencies and peculiarities; it may not work instantly for you (it may not ever work for you)! That being said, feel free to download and play with it.

### Dependencies

* Add soon.

### Authors and Contributors
This software was developed during HopHacks (Spring, 2015) by Jeliazko Jeliazkov (@lqtza), Max Klein (@telamonian), Henry Lessen (too-cool-for-GitHub), and Mariusz Matyszewski (@matyszm).

### Support or Contact
This is very crude software. If you want to complain about the shape of the rocks, call the universe.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
